takeOutLoan(((address,address,uint256,ui.details: collateral ratio is a percentage of the loan amount that's required in collateralthe percentage will be *(10**2). I.e. collateralRatio of 5244 means 52.44% collateralis required in the loan. Interest rate is also a percentage with 2 decimal points.

params.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral required for the loan
params.collateralToken: Token address to use as collateral for the new loan
params.request: Struct of the protocol loan request
